doc.description:
Angle of Attack sensor using PWM input
Driver for a PWM based angle of attack sensor A second sensor can be defined for the sideslip angle It is assumed that both sensors are the same, only sensitivity, offset and direction can differ.
Sensor example: US DIGITAL MA3-P12-125-B

configure.name: AOA_PWM_CHANNEL
configure.description: Select PWM input channel for AOA sensor

define.name: AOA_OFFSET
define.description: offset in radian that can be set from settings

define.name: AOA_ANGLE_OFFSET
define.description: global offset in radian corresponding to the sensor mounting (default: 3.14)

define.name: AOA_REVERSE
define.description: set to TRUE to reverse rotation direction

define.name: AOA_PWM_PERIOD
define.description: period in microsec (e.g. 4096 for 12 bits sensor)

define.name: AOA_PWM_OFFSET
define.description: initial offset on the raw pwm signal if needed (default: 1usec)

define.name: LOG_AOA
define.description: enable logging on SD card (default: FALSE)

configure.name: SSA_PWM_CHANNEL
configure.description: Select PWM input channel for Sideslip sensor (optional)

define.name: SSA_OFFSET
define.description: offset in radian that can be set from settings

define.name: SSA_REVERSE
define.description: set to TRUE to reverse rotation direction
